## StringEncoding.decode() method

Decodes the given text.

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
decode(text: BufferLike, options?: DecodeOptions): string;
```

## Parameters

|  Parameter | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  text | <code>BufferLike</code> | The encoded text. |
|  options | <code>DecodeOptions</code> | Options for decoding. |

<b>Returns:</b>

`string`

The decoded text, as a string.

## Remarks

Throws [InvalidEncodedTextError](./iconv-corefoundation.invalidencodedtexterror.md) if the `text` is not valid in this encoding.
